revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=MI424WR |revision=C |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |est_release_date=01/2007 |fcc_date=08/24/2006 |fcc_id=LNQ802MAG |type=wireless router, FiOS modem |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F640-J3D75 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J20 |wi1_module=Actiontec 802MAG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721BL |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995MA |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=MoCA 1.0 |stock_boot=RGLoader |stock_os=Linux;2.4.21;Jungo OpenRG; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=XXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''unit's serial number'' |oui=00:18:01 |oui_eth=00:18:01 }} The device presumably uses two ''Entropic Communications'' EN2010 :for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections.
The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers :(example: '''50U24''').
*{{TechInfoDepot|Actiontec_MI424WR_rev_C}}
